privacyPolicy.oneSubtitle:
1.1 We collect the following data from users of our application:
Username: For user identification and to provide a personalized user experience.
Password: To secure the user's account.
Email Address: For important notifications, password recovery, and feedback.
Anime Genre Interests: To improve recommendations and personalized content.
Network Status and IP Address: For optimizing streaming quality and preventing abuse.
Gallery Access: Permission to access the device's gallery for image saving and sharing.
Bank Card Data: We only store necessary data for payment processing, if applicable.
privacyPolicy.twoSubtitle:
2.1 We commit to taking all reasonable measures to protect collected data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
2.2 Credit card information is stored following payment card security standards, and we do not disclose full card details to third parties.
privacyPolicy.threeSubtitle: 3.1 We do not transfer users' personal data to third parties, except when required by law and only upon request from competent authorities, including law enforcement agencies.
privacyPolicy.fourSubtitle: 4.1 We reserve the right to periodically update our Privacy Policy. Changes will be published within the application, and you will be provided an opportunity to review the updated version.
privacyPolicy.five: By using our application, you agree to the terms of our Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at [contact information].
